# init(rawValue:)

**Initializer**

Creates a new ARGB type with an unsigned integer value.

## Declaration

```swift
init(rawValue: UInt32)
```

## Parameters

- **rawValue**: A raw unsigned integer value.

## Constants

- **init(_:)**: Creates a new ARGB type.
- **rawValue**: The unsigned integer raw value.
- **kvImageARGB16Q12**: Any 8-bit four-channel interleaved buffer.
- **kvImageARGB16U**: Any 16-bit unsigned, four-channel interleaved buffer.
- **kvImageARGB8888**: Any 16-bit signed fixed-point, four-channel interleaved buffer.

items.description: Any 16-bit signed fixed-point, four-channel interleaved buffer.
items.name: kvImageARGB8888
